alert.note: Alert for Allen; Putnam; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 3:26PM EST until February 27 at 4:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Putnam County in west central Ohio... Eastern Van Wert County in west central Ohio... Allen County in west central Ohio... * Until 400 PM EST. * At 326 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ottoville to 6 miles east of Ohio City, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Ottoville around 330 PM EST. Delphos, Spencerville and Spencerville In Allen County around 335 PM EST. Elida and Kalida around 340 PM EST. Lima, Ottawa, Fort Shawnee, Columbus Grove and Glandorf around 345 PM EST. Pandora around 350 PM EST. Bluffton around 355 PM EST. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Yoder, Westminster, Harrod, Gomer, Rushmore, Jonestown, Rimer, Venedocia, Elgin and Wetzel. This includes Interstate 75 between mile markers 119 and 141. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for west central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for west central Ohio.
